DOC.criteria: woman singleton pregnancy , deliver vaginally 28 week gestation , prolonged third stage labor ( 30 minute ) despite active management , Haemodynamically stable accept participate trial multiple pregnancy , previous caesarean delivery , haemodynamically instability , severe anaemia ( haemoglobin concentration < 8 g/dL ) , chorioamnionitis Refused participate trial
